Entries.57872024/f Leximonster 2500/t 800 1600: night_market/-100 -100/Leximonster 35 6 2 farmer 26 7 1/skippable/ignoreCollisions farmer/viewport 30 8 clamp true/move farmer 3 0 1/faceDirection Leximonster 4/emote Leximonster 56/move Leximonster -2 0 2/move Leximonster 0 1 3/move Leximonster -2 0 3/speak Leximonster "@! Is good to see you. Have surprise for you today. I think you will like this very much?$1"/addObject 30 7 152/playSound slimedead/emote farmer 8/speak Leximonster "Is very special seaweed. Friend Gull find it for me. Is from special reef: far, far away.#$b#It help you breathe underwater, like me!$1"/emote farmer 16/speak Leximonster "I wonder, would friend @ like to go on adventure with me?"/question null "...#I'd love to!#Sure, I guess..."/speak Leximonster "Is very exciting! You see my world - maybe one day, I see your world again? Yes!$4"/emote farmer 32/playSound pickUpItem/removeSprite 30 7/farmerEat 152/pause 1000/animate farmer false true 350 104 105/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer 57/pause 1000/playSound achievement/message "You can now (temporarily) breathe underwater!"/speak Leximonster "You okay, friend @? Look a little green around gills.$2"/pause 500/showFrame farmer 0/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 56/speak Leximonster "I am glad. Now, come, come, swim after me!"/move Leximonster 0 1 3/move Leximonster -2 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/move Leximonster -11 0 2 true/move farmer -11 0 2 true/viewport move -2 0 5000 true/pause 6000/fade/stopMusic/viewport -1000 -1000/playSound waterSlosh/pause 500/playSound waterSlosh/swimming Leximonster/warp farmer 59 128/warp Leximonster 60 128/changeLocation Custom_EastScarpe/viewport 71 129 clamp true/faceDirection Leximonster 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Leximonster "Once long time ago, many years ago, I went out, look for my kin.#$b#I travel long way, see many thing. See them too, my people... but when I talk to them, they not understand.$2#$b#They not want me, am not one of them. But on way home, I find something wonderful!$1"/speak Leximonster "Come, come, I show you!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 56/pause 500/textAboveHead Leximonster "Follow me!"/pause 500/faceDirection Leximonster 2/playSound waterSlosh/warp Leximonster -100 -100/faceDirection farmer 2/playSound waterSlosh/warp farmer -100 -100/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopSwimming Leximonster/changeLocation Custom_UnderwaterLexi/warp Leximonster 21 12/warp farmer 20 12/viewport 21 12 clamp true/pause 1000/emote farmer 16/pause 500/faceDirection Leximonster 3/speak Leximonster "Ship, she sunk many, many year ago. Carry many treasures. Most gone now, lost to sea, eaten by fish.$2#$b#But one marvelous thing, it remain.$1"/faceDirection Leximonster 2/jump Leximonster 7/faceDirection farmer 2/viewport move 0 2 4000 true/positionOffset
